item.title: WATCH: The love of singing and joy this holiday season
item.description: Pierre Thomas has the story of spreading unity and acceptance through the power of song this holiday season.

item.title: WATCH: Flood emergency in California
item.description: The state of California is under a state of emergency as 40+ million brace for potential catastrophic rains.

item.title: Ticket sold in Arkansas wins $1.8B Powerball jackpot -- 2nd biggest ever
item.description: A ticket sold in Arkansas matched all six numbers to win a $1.817 billion jackpot -- the second biggest U.S. lottery ever, according to Powerball.
